data.title: Cannabis Advisory Committee
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: The Cannabis Advisory Committee are subject-matter experts that advise the Department of Cannabis Control on regulations.

content.rendered:
The Cannabis Advisory Committee are subject-matter experts that advise the Department of Cannabis Control on regulations that:

  • Protect public health and safety
  • Reduce the illegal cannabis market

Committee members

Members represent key groups including:

  • Cannabis industry
  • Labor organizations
  • State and local agencies
  • Racially, ethnically and economically diverse populations
  • Public health experts

Jeffrey P. Ferro, Committee Chair
Director, Cannabis Workers Rising
Executive Assistant to the Director of Organizing, United Food and Commercial Workers International Union
Labor organization representative

Upcoming meetings

No meetings are scheduled.

Annual reports

Each year the committee issues a report that describes:

  • What they did during the previous year
  • Recommendations made
  • Whether recommendations were implemented

The committee has issued the following reports:

  • 2020 annual report
  • 2019 annual report
  • 2018 annual report
